entry.content:
Homework 3 - Creating effective visualizations using best practices

Library: Altair

The reason I choose "Altair" is that this library is convenient. I want to achieve several interactive behaviors including multi-Line Tooltip, interactive average and interactive legend, and of these interactions can be implemented in "altair".

The first visualization

The first visualization is used to compare different counties malaria deaths or malaria incidence. The first parameter is a list of country name, representing the countries we want to compare. The second parameter is a string, inputing 'Deaths' means that we want to compare malaria deaths, while inpunting 'Incidence' means that we want to compare incidence.

The visualization has interactive behavior tied to the x position of the cursor. When the cursor is moved over, the most recent value will be displayed.

The second visualization

The second visualization is used to obtain the n countries with the highest number of deaths or infection rates in a given year. The first parameter is an int input, representing the year we are interested. The second parameter is an int input, meaning the number of countries we want to see. The third parameter is a string, inputing 'Deaths' means that we want to compare malaria deaths, while inpunting 'Incidence' means that we want to compare incidence.

The visualization uses an interval selection, which causes the chart to include an interactive brush (shown in grey). The brush selection parameterizes the red guideline, which visualizes the average value within the selected interval.

The third visualization

The third visualization is used to obtain the specified country age group distribution about malaria deaths. The only parameter is a string, representing the country we are interested in.

The visualization has interactive legend. We can choose one category of the legend to see specific age group area.

div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;

  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: transparent;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5px;
  /* This acts as a spacer between cells, that is outside the border */
  margin: 0px;
  outline: none;
  position: relative;
  overflow: visible;
}
div.cell:before {
  position: absolute;

  left: -1px;
  width: 5px;
  height: calc(100% +  2px);
  content: '';
  background: transparent;
}

}
@media print {

}
div.cell.selected,

}

.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */

/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See

 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;

  font-size: 14px;

}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */
  /* we have set a different line-height and want this to scale with that. */
  /* Note that this should set vertical padding only, since CodeMirror assumes
       that horizontal padding will be set on CodeMirror pre */
  padding: 0.4em 0;
}
.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  padding: 0 8px 0 4px;
}
.CodeMirror-gutters {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
  border-top-left-radius: 2px;
}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. This sets horizontal padding only,
    use .CodeMirror-lines for vertical */
  padding: 0 0.4em;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
.CodeMirror-cursor {
  border-left: 1.4px solid black;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 2138px) and (max-width: 4319px) {

    border-left: 2px solid black;

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;

  display: -moz-box;

  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);

}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;

  display: -webkit-box;

div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {

}

div.output_area {

.output {

div.output_subarea {

  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;

  flex: 1;

}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {

/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;

  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {

/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {

div.raw_input_container {

input.raw_input {

<h2 id="Homework-3---Creating-effective-visualizations-using-best-practices">Homework 3 - Creating effective visualizations using best practices<a class="anchor-link" href="#Homework-3---Creating-effective-visualizations-using-best-practices">¶</a></h2><h4 id="Ruiqi-Zhang">Ruiqi Zhang<a class="anchor-link" href="#Ruiqi-Zhang">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Blog:">Blog:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Blog:">¶</a></h4><p><a href="https://ruiqi-zhang063.github.io">https://ruiqi-zhang063.github.io</a></p>
<h4 id="Github-repository">Github repository<a class="anchor-link" href="#Github-repository">¶</a></h4><p><a href="https://github.com/ruiqi-zhang063/ruiqi-zhang063.github.io">https://github.com/ruiqi-zhang063/ruiqi-zhang063.github.io</a></p>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Install-Package">Install Package<a class="anchor-link" href="#Install-Package">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># ! pip install altair</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Import-Packages">Import Packages<a class="anchor-link" href="#Import-Packages">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">altair</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">alt</span>
<span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data_transformers</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">disable_max_rows</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[2]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>DataTransformerRegistry.enable('default')</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">url_1</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2018/2018-11-13/malaria_deaths.csv'</span>
<span class="n">malaria_deaths</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">url_1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">url_2</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2018/2018-11-13/malaria_deaths_age.csv'</span>
<span class="n">malaria_deaths_age</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">url_2</span><span class="p">)</span>

</pre></div>

    <span class="s1">'Deaths - Malaria - Sex: Both - Age: Age-standardized (Rate) (per 100,000 people)'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Deaths (per 100,000 people)'</span>
<span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">malaria_inc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">malaria_inc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">'Incidence of malaria (per 1,000 population at risk) (per 1,000 population at risk)'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'Incidence (per 1,000 population at risk)'</span>
<span class="p">})</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="The-first-visualization">The first visualization<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-first-visualization">¶</a></h3><p>The first visualization is used to compare different counties malaria deaths or malaria incidence. The first parameter is a list of country name, representing the countries we want to compare. The second parameter is a string, inputing 'Deaths' means that we want to compare malaria deaths, while inpunting 'Incidence' means that we want to compare incidence.</p>
<p>The visualization has interactive behavior tied to the x position of the cursor. When the cursor is moved over, the most recent value will be displayed.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">Country_Compare</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">country_list</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">compare_label</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">'''</span>
<span class="sd">    Compare different counties malaria deaths or malaria incidence.</span>
<span class="sd">    </span>
<span class="sd">    Parameter</span>
<span class="sd">    ---------</span>
<span class="sd">    country_list: list</span>
<span class="sd">        The list of countries name that we want to compare.</span>
<span class="sd">    compare_label: str</span>
<span class="sd">        The data we want to compare, must be either 'Deaths' or 'Incidence'.</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">    Result </span>
<span class="sd">    ---------</span>
<span class="sd">    figure: visualization</span>
<span class="sd">        The line chart with interactive behavior tied to the x position of the cursor.</span>
<span class="sd">    '''</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">compare_label</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Deaths'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">malaria_deaths</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">malaria_deaths</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Entity'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">country_list</span><span class="p">)]</span>
        <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Deaths (per 100,000 people)'</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">compare_label</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Incidence'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">malaria_inc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">malaria_inc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Entity'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">country_list</span><span class="p">)]</span>
        <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Incidence (per 1,000 population at risk)'</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s1">'Compare_label is not correct, it should be either "Deaths" or "Incidence"'</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">empty</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s1">'No data for the corresponding country'</span>
    
    <span class="n">nearest</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">selection</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'single'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nearest</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'mouseover'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                            <span class="n">fields</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Year'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">empty</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'none'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">line</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Chart</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_line</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Year'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="p">,</span> 
        <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Entity'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">selectors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Chart</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_point</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Year:Q'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">opacity</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_selection</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">nearest</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">points</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">line</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_point</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">opacity</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">condition</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nearest</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">line</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">align</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">dx</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">dy</span><span class="o">=-</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">text</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">condition</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nearest</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">' '</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">rules</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Chart</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_rule</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'gray'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Year:Q'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transform_filter</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">nearest</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">figure</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">layer</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">line</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">selectors</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">points</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">rules</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">text</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">figure</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Example-of-the-first-visualization">Example of the first visualization<a class="anchor-link" href="#Example-of-the-first-visualization">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Country_Compare</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Afghanistan'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Algeria'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Angola'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s1">'Deaths'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="The-second-visualization">The second visualization<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-second-visualization">¶</a></h3><p>The second visualization is used to obtain the n countries with the highest number of deaths or infection rates in a given year. The first parameter is an int input, representing the year we are interested. The second parameter is an int input, meaning the number of countries we want to see. The third parameter is a string, inputing 'Deaths' means that we want to compare malaria deaths, while inpunting 'Incidence' means that we want to compare incidence.</p>
<p>The visualization uses an interval selection, which causes the chart to include an interactive brush (shown in grey). The brush selection parameterizes the red guideline, which visualizes the average value within the selected interval.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">Year_Overview</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">number</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">compare_label</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">'''</span>
<span class="sd">    Obtain the n countries with the highest number of deaths or infection rates in a given year.</span>
<span class="sd">    </span>
<span class="sd">    Parameter</span>
<span class="sd">    ---------</span>
<span class="sd">    Year: int</span>
<span class="sd">        The year we are interested in.</span>
<span class="sd">    number: int</span>
<span class="sd">        The number of countries we want to see.</span>
<span class="sd">    compare_label: str</span>
<span class="sd">        The data we want to see, must be either 'Deaths' or 'Incidence'.</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">    Result </span>
<span class="sd">    ---------</span>
<span class="sd">    figure: visualization</span>
<span class="sd">        The bar chart with interactive behavior which visualizes the average value within the selected interval.</span>
<span class="sd">    '''</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">compare_label</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Deaths'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">malaria_deaths</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">malaria_deaths</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Year'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Deaths (per 100,000 people)'</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">compare_label</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Incidence'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">malaria_inc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">malaria_inc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Year'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Incidence (per 1,000 population at risk)'</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s1">'Compare_label is not correct, it should be either "Deaths" or "Incidence"'</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">empty</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s1">'No data for the corresponding Year'</span>
        
    <span class="n">data_sorted</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">by</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ascending</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">number</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">brush</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">selection</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'interval'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">encodings</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'y'</span><span class="p">])</span> 
    
    <span class="n">bars</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Chart</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sorted</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_bar</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Y</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">field</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Entity'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'nominal'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sort</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'x'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'descending'</span><span class="p">]),</span> 
        <span class="n">opacity</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">condition</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">brush</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">OpacityValue</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">OpacityValue</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">)),</span>
    <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_selection</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">brush</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">line</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Chart</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_rule</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'firebrick'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">'mean(</span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">label</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">):Q'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">SizeValue</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transform_filter</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">brush</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">figure</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">layer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">bars</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_sorted</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">figure</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Example-of-the-second-visualization">Example of the second visualization<a class="anchor-link" href="#Example-of-the-second-visualization">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Year_Overview</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2010</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Deaths'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="The-third-visualization">The third visualization<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-third-visualization">¶</a></h3><p>The third visualization is used to obtain the specified country age group distribution about malaria deaths. The only parameter is a string, representing the country we are interested in.</p>
<p>The visualization has interactive legend. We can choose one category of the legend to see specific age group area.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">Age_Distribution</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Country</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">'''</span>
<span class="sd">    Obtain the specified country age group distribution about malaria deaths.</span>
<span class="sd">    </span>
<span class="sd">    Parameter</span>
<span class="sd">    ---------</span>
<span class="sd">    Country: string</span>
<span class="sd">        The country we are interested in.</span>
<span class="sd">        </span>
<span class="sd">    Result </span>
<span class="sd">    ---------</span>
<span class="sd">    figure: visualization</span>
<span class="sd">        The area chart with interactive legend.</span>
<span class="sd">    '''</span>

    <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">malaria_deaths_age</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">malaria_deaths_age</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'entity'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">Country</span><span class="p">]</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">empty</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s1">'No data for the corresponding county'</span>
    
    <span class="n">selection</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">selection_multi</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fields</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'age_group'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">bind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'legend'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">figure</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Chart</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mark_area</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">encode</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'year'</span> <span class="p">,</span> 
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'sum(deaths)'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
        <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Color</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'age_group:N'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">sort</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Under 5'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'5-14'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'15-49'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="s1">'50-69'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'70 or older'</span><span class="p">]</span>
                         <span class="p">),</span>
        <span class="n">opacity</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">condition</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">selection</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">alt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_selection</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">selection</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">figure</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Example-of-the-third-visualization">Example of the third visualization<a class="anchor-link" href="#Example-of-the-third-visualization">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Age_Distribution</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Mozambique'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">
